title: Power Virtual Server
introduction: With the Power Virtual Server, you can quickly create and deploy one or more virtual servers on IBM Cloud (that are running either the AIX, IBM i, or Linux operating systems).

section_highlights.title: IBM Power11 Launches in IBM Power Virtual Server
section_highlights.description: With the general availability of IBM Power11 in IBM Power Virtual Server and across all server classes - clients can unlock new levels of performance, flexibility, and resilience for their mission-critical workloads.

section_highlights.title: Connecting Power Virtual Server to Microsoft Azure
section_highlights.description: This topic provides a detailed guide on how to connect IBM Power Virtual Server to Microsoft Azure with Megaport.

tiles.title: You can deploy Power Virtual Server instances running the AIX, IBM i, RHEL, and SLES operating systems on IBM Power11 (subject to capacity availability).
